Overview: The Snippet Manager is a powerful Chrome extension designed to enhance productivity by allowing users to create, store, and manage text snippets. With this extension, users can easily assign shortcuts to their frequently used phrases or texts, which can then be quickly inserted into any text area on web pages, saving time and effort in repetitive typing tasks.

Key Features:

Easy Snippet Creation:

Users can create text snippets and assign custom shortcut keys to them. This feature is particularly useful for repetitive text entries like email responses, code snippets, or any frequently used text.
User-Friendly Interface:

The extension features a sleek, futuristic design that enhances the user experience. The intuitive layout allows for seamless navigation and easy management of snippets.
Quick Access to Snippets:

Snippets can be inserted into any text area simply by typing their assigned shortcut key. This functionality makes it easy to access and use snippets without having to navigate away from the current task.
Persistent Storage:

All snippets are saved using Chromeâ€™s storage API, ensuring that they are available even after the browser is closed. Users can manage their snippets across different sessions effortlessly.
Custom Shortcut Management:

Users have the flexibility to create their own shortcuts for snippets, enabling personalized workflows tailored to their needs.
List of Saved Snippets:

The extension provides a clear list of all saved snippets, allowing users to quickly review and manage their entries. Users can easily see which shortcuts correspond to which snippets.
